definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs

sentences.english: What king would ever become " lowly , and riding upon an ass"?
sentences.chinese: 有哪一位國王會“謙謙和和地騎著驢”？

sentences.english: While personally a modest man, Dr LEE was a bold leader.
sentences.chinese: 李博士爲人謙和，同時也是一位大無畏的領導。

sentences.english: The cloud stood humbly in full ofive pgood of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 白雲謙和地站在天之一隅。

sentences.english: Maintaining in a modest and peaceful mental state pushes us further up to a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 保持謙和的心理狀態有助於我們達到更高的高度。

sentences.english: China since ancient times, etiquette, speech which mostly reflect the modesty and respect people.
sentences.chinese: 中國自古講究禮儀，言語當中多是體現自謙和敬人。

sentences.english: These humble shepherds were the first to hear and ponder the wondrous news of the birth of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 謙和的牧民們第一次聽到並思索着基督誕世之奇聞。

sentences.english: He is modest affability with high responsibility and nobility medical ethics.
sentences.chinese: 爲人謙和，有高度的責任心和高尚醫德。

sentences.english: The wise man opens his front door with humility and a spirit of acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 聰明的人總是帶着恭謙和接受的態度打開前門。

sentences.english: On Wednesday we went to William and Wendy's wedding in Washington.
sentences.chinese: 星期三我們去了華盛頓參加了威謙和溫迪的婚禮。

definition: cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
